name: Mones
highlight: Mones is a new generation P2E RPG game on Avalanche where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy.
summary: With tagline “Here for the P2E revolution”, Mones is a new generation P2E RPG game on Avalanche where you not only enjoy the exciting gameplay, but also connect with other players through social features and earn long-term profits from a player-driven economy.
